info.name: ZeresPluginLibrary
info.description: Gives other plugins utility functions and the ability to emulate v2.

changelog.title: Bugs Squashed
items: Fixed onAdded() and onRemoved() in DOMTools
The weird <span> in the plugin update bar
Fixed parents() giving an error when using a root element

changelog.title: Improvements
items: Remove jQuery dependency in ContextMenu module
DOMTools class related function now automagically split on space -- great for using internal classes

changelog.title: On-going
items: More classes and modules being added
